body:
Comment 3: 
The syscall package is system dependent.  If you wrote a C program that used TIOCGETA or
TIOCSETA, it would not compile on GNU/Linux, because there are no such ioctls.  A Go
program should behave the same way.

I agree that TCGETA and TCSETA are probably what you want when running on GNU/Linux.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
